title: ReportLocalSettings
description: The ReportLocalSettings stored as localSettings.json holds report settings that only apply for the current user/machine. This file is optional.

reportId.title: ReportId
reportId.description: The ID of a published report created from this definition.

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of the local settings file format.

remoteArtifacts.title: RemoteArtifacts
remoteArtifacts.description: Describes the published Power BI artifacts associated with this definition.

securityBindingsSignature.title: SecurityBindingsSignature
securityBindingsSignature.description: A base64 encoded signature which when absent or invalid will require the user to review or consent.
